e: ￹`Tafoen~ `ko~ `codad~ `iso~ `a~ `pa~`nokay~.￺Wrap up your books and take them home.￻把書本包起來帶回家
￹`Aka~ `pi~`tafo~ `i~ `faloco'~ `iso~ `to~ `keter~.￺Don't keep anger in your heart.￻不要把怨氣埋藏在心裡
￹`O~ `malo~ `sa~`tafo~ `konini~.￺This is good for wrapping.￻這是用來包裝的(包裝紙)
d.f: ￹￺to wrap up * to make a bundle￻包裝，捆成一包
